characters.name: Arista
characters.description: Appears in To Change a Changeling. Design reused from S06E26 Unnamed Changeling #6. Named on Enterplay collectible card game Friends Forever #39 C.

characters.name: Queen Chrysalis
characters.description: See Queen Chrysalis.

characters.name: Chrysalis
characters.description: An alternate universe counterpart of Queen Chrysalis, depicted in stained glass. Stated by the alternate King Sombra in Issue #19 to be looking after the Equestrian south. She is a character named "Loving Chrysalis" in Gameloft's mobile game, and serves as a boss battle helper during the "Reflections: Battle for the Sun" event. Her bio states, "The most loving creature you'd ever hope to meet, this Chrysalis cares deeply and sincerely about your needs. Yes -- YOU!"

characters.name:
Changeling 2
Cornicle
characters.description: Appears in Celestial Advice in one of Twilight Sparkle's fantasies with a speaking role and in To Change a Changeling as one of the changeling theater performers. Referred to as "Changeling #2" in Celestial Advice's broadcast script. Design reused from S06E26 Unnamed Changeling #1. A character called "Changeling Actor" in Gameloft's mobile game. Identified on Enterplay collectible card game Friends Forever #40 C. Voiced by Vincent Tong.

characters.name: Delilah
characters.description: A changeling who disguises herself as a mare to drain love from Apple Crispy in Lyra and Bon Bon and the Mares from S.M.I.L.E.

characters.name:
Assistant Changeling
Frenulum
characters.description: Appears in To Change a Changeling as a changeling that helps Thorax lure the maulwurf away. Design reused from S06E26 Unnamed Changeling #4. Named on Enterplay collectible card game Friends Forever #51 C. Voiced by Ian Hanlin.

characters.name: Kevin
characters.description: Appears in Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2 during Let the Rainbow Remind You and in Slice of Life at Cranky Doodle Donkey and Matilda's wedding. Has been noted by M. A. Larson, who helped pick a name, which is given on Enterplay collectible card game High Magic expansion set cards #84 C and #PÆ’14 that list the respective quotes "Hey, I'm just here for the food." and "Now you see me, and now you don't..." His design is used for most changelings in A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2, in To Where and Back Again - Part 1, in the IDW comics, in Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 1, and in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name: Ocellus
characters.description: See Ocellus.

characters.name: Pharynx
characters.description: See Pharynx.

characters.name:
Painted Changeling
Sclerite
characters.description: Appears in To Change a Changeling as a changeling that Pharynx dumps paint on. A character called "Paint-Covered Changeling" in Gameloft's mobile game. Named on Enterplay collectible card game Friends Forever #83 C. Voiced by Ellen-Ray Hennessy.

characters.name: Thorax
characters.description: See Thorax.

characters.name:
Group Leader
Tymbal
characters.description: Appears in To Change a Changeling as the leader of the changelings' Feelings Forum. Design reused from S06E26 Unnamed Changeling #4. A character called "Changeling Counselor" in Gameloft's mobile game. Named on Enterplay collectible card game Friends Forever #81 U. Voiced by Ellen-Ray Hennessy.

characters.name: Urtica
characters.description: Appears in My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic Issue #61 and Issue #62 as the official changeling archivist at the Convocation of Creatures. She is a character in Gameloft's mobile game, and serves as a boss battle helper for the "Convocation of the Creatures!" event. Her bio states, "The bubbliest changeling librarian you'll ever see -- and quite possibly the only one!"

characters.name:
Twilight Changeling
S06E25 Unnamed Changeling
characters.description: Appears disguised as Twilight Sparkle in To Where and Back Again - Part 1. Design reused from original changeling design. Voiced by Ian Hanlin.

characters.name:
Metamorphosed Sentry
S06E26 Unnamed Changeling #1
characters.description: Design used for changelings in To Where and Back Again - Part 2, Celestial Advice, To Change a Changeling, School Daze - Part 2, The Ending of the End - Part 2, and Gameloft's mobile game for Metamorphosed Sentry. The latter serves as an enemy minion during the "Convocation of the Creatures!" event.

characters.name: S06E26 Unnamed Changeling #2
characters.description: Design used for changelings in To Where and Back Again - Part 2, Celestial Advice, To Change a Changeling, The Ending of the End - Part 2, and The Last Problem.

characters.name: S06E26 Unnamed Changeling #3
characters.description: Design used for changelings in To Where and Back Again - Part 2, Celestial Advice, To Change a Changeling, Between Dark and Dawn, and The Ending of the End - Part 2. Has a similar color scheme to Thorax.

characters.name:
Metamorphosed Drone
S06E26 Unnamed Changeling #4
characters.description: Design used for changelings in To Where and Back Again - Part 2, Celestial Advice, To Change a Changeling, The Ending of the End - Part 2, The Last Problem, and Gameloft's mobile game for Metamorphosed Drone.

characters.name:
Metamorphosed Soldier
S06E26 Unnamed Changeling #5
characters.description: Design used for changelings in To Where and Back Again - Part 2, Celestial Advice, To Change a Changeling, The Ending of the End - Part 2, and Gameloft's mobile game for Metamorphosed Soldier.

characters.name:
Metamorphosed Worker
S06E26 Unnamed Changeling #6
characters.description: Design used for changelings in To Where and Back Again - Part 2, Celestial Advice, To Change a Changeling, Between Dark and Dawn, The Ending of the End - Part 2, The Last Problem, and Gameloft's mobile game for Metamorphosed Worker.

characters.name: S07E01 Unnamed Changeling #1
characters.description: Appears in Celestial Advice during the party for Starlight Glimmer, Trixie, Discord, and Thorax. Design reused from S06E26 Unnamed Changeling #1. Voiced (uncredited).

characters.name: S07E01 Unnamed Changeling #2
characters.description: Appears in Celestial Advice during the party for Starlight Glimmer, Trixie, Discord, and Thorax. Design reused from S06E26 Unnamed Changeling #5. Voiced (uncredited).

characters.name:
Changeling Girl
S07E01 Unnamed Changeling #3
characters.description: Appears in Celestial Advice during the party for Starlight Glimmer, Trixie, Discord, and Thorax. Referred to as "Changeling Girl" in the episode's broadcast script. Design reused from S06E26 Unnamed Changeling #5. Voiced by Nicole Oliver (credited in the script's credits; uncredited in the episode's credits).

characters.name:
Changeling 1
S07E01 Unnamed Changeling #4
characters.description: Appears in Celestial Advice during one of Twilight Sparkle's fantasies. Referred to as "Changeling #1" in the episode's broadcast script. Design reused from S06E26 Unnamed Changeling #2. Voiced by Ashleigh Ball.

characters.name:
Goofy Changeling
S07E01 Unnamed Changeling #5
characters.description: Appears in Celestial Advice disguised as Starlight Glimmer in one of Twilight Sparkle's fantasies. A character called "Trickster Changeling" in Gameloft's mobile game. Voiced (as Starlight) by Kelly Sheridan.

characters.name:
Green Changeling
S07E17 Unnamed Changeling #1
characters.description: Appears in To Change a Changeling having an identity crisis during the changelings' Feelings Forum. Design reused from S06E26 Unnamed Changeling #4. Voiced by Kelly Sheridan.

characters.name:
Changeling 1
S07E17 Unnamed Changeling #2
characters.description: Appears in To Change a Changeling as one of the changelings in the Feelings Forum. Design reused from S06E26 Unnamed Changeling #5. Voiced by Ian Hanlin.

characters.name:
Changeling 2
S07E17 Unnamed Changeling #3
characters.description: Appears in To Change a Changeling as one of the changelings in the Feelings Forum. Design reused from S06E26 Unnamed Changeling #1. Voiced by Ashleigh Ball.

characters.name:
Changeling 3
S07E17 Unnamed Changeling #4
characters.description: Appears in To Change a Changeling as one of the changelings in the Feelings Forum. Design reused from S06E26 Unnamed Changeling #2. Voiced by Ashleigh Ball.

characters.name:
Young Changeling
S07E17 Unnamed Changeling #5
characters.description: Appears in To Change a Changeling in Thorax's flashback. Voiced by Ian Hanlin.

characters.name:
Passing Changeling
S07E17 Unnamed Changeling #6
characters.description: Appears in To Change a Changeling telling Trixie where to find Pharynx. Design reused from S06E26 Unnamed Changeling #6. Voiced by Kyle Rideout.

characters.name:
Ocellus's Mom
S08E15 Unnamed Changeling #1
characters.description: Appears in The Hearth's Warming Club as one of Ocellus' family members in her story. Also appears in My Little Pony Best Gift Ever, Uprooted, A Horse Shoe-In, and The Ending of the End - Part 2. She is a character called "Ocellus's Mom" in Gameloft's mobile game. Her bio states "She just loves exchanging Hearth's Warming gifts. Sometimes, she'll pass them around for hours!"

characters.name:
Ocellus's Sister
S08E15 Unnamed Changeling #2
characters.description: Appears in The Hearth's Warming Club as one of Ocellus' family members in her story. Also appears in My Little Pony Best Gift Ever and Uprooted. She is a character called "Ocellus's Sister" in Gameloft's mobile game. Her bio states, "She always looks forward to building Hearth's Warming fires -- just so long as they're not ACTUALLY on fire."

characters.name:
Ocellus's Dad
S08E15 Unnamed Changeling #3
characters.description: Appears in The Hearth's Warming Club as one of Ocellus' family members in her story. Also appears in My Little Pony Best Gift Ever, Uprooted, A Horse Shoe-In, and The Ending of the End - Part 2. He is a character called "Ocellus's Dad" in Gameloft's mobile game. His bio states, "He just loves putting up the Hearth's Warming Tree -- even if it IS a little hard on his exoskeleton." Voiced by Peter New in A Horse Shoe-In.

characters.name:
Ocellus's Brother
S08E15 Unnamed Changeling #4
characters.description: Appears in The Hearth's Warming Club as one of Ocellus' family members in her story. Also appears in My Little Pony Best Gift Ever and Uprooted. He is a character called "Ocellus's Brother" in Gameloft's mobile game. His bio states "He always looks forward to diving into some Hearth's Warming punch. Sometimes, he cannonballs into it instead!"

characters.name: Issue 4 Unnamed Changeling
characters.description: Appears on My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic Issue #4 page 9 as one of Queen Chrysalis' more muscular changeling drones.

characters.name: Unnamed Changeling
characters.description: Appears in Hasbro and Pepe Ganga's October 2017 My Little Pony commercial. Voiced.
